features: Ceramic Coated Soleplate: The ceramic coated soleplate can fast even heat while maintaining even heat distribution throughout the soleplate. Unmatched steaming power to easily decimate the toughest wrinkles and easily glide across various garments and smooth hard-to-reach areas. Harder than stainless steel, super scratch resistant, and more durable and easier to clean

Safety Feature: In order to ensure the quality of the product, all irons are thoroughly pre-tested at the factory. For the pre-test process, there may be some condensation water left in the water tank, which is NORMAL and is not a product for used sales. This iron comes with thermal cutout protection. And equipped with high temperature resistant base.If you have any questions about this iron, please feel free to contact us, a one-year warranty is guaranteed.

Wide Application: Steam iron is equipped with 3 Steam Modes, allowing for use on a variety of fabrics including Nylon, Wool, linen, cotton, silk, wool, synthetic and so on. Based on fabric type, you can easily select the ideal steam output. Look no further! From now on you can iron almost any fabric you want.

Rapid And Efficient: Our steam iron reaches max temperature in 25 seconds, much faster than traditional irons. Based on fabric type, you can easily select the ideal steam output. Powerful burst of steam delivers an extra blast of steam, allowing you to removing wrinkles quickly and easily. Perfect for sewers, quilters, crafters and home ironing clothes care.

Compact Design: This garment steamer is portable and lightweight, making it an ideal travel companion. Perfect for travel and on the go touchups, heating up fast and dewrinkling fabrics in minutes. The portable steamer for clothes comes with a bag for storage and can be carried around, perfect for travel, school, college, business trips and daily use. Perfect for back to school,off to college, Festival, Birthday Gift

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ideal for Quick Touch Ups Are you searching for a little machine which can be carried worldwide and make your clothes look tid all the time? However, many irons in the market are bulky and inefficiently designed, not fit for travel in factually. Portable travel Steamer is strong enough, extremely lightweight and compact for taking along with you. Whether your definition of a polished look is a well-pressed suit, a smooth silk dress or a wrinkle-free shirt for work, you can achieve it with the Clothing Iron. Perfect for Father's Day, Festival, Birthday Gift

Easy Steam Compact Clothing Iron Powerful steam, precise temperature, professional results Ironing is simpler than ever and an easy to grasp, comfortable handle. Steam iron is equipped with 3 Steam Modes, allowing for use on a variety of fabrics including Nylon, Wool, linen, cotton, silk, wool, synthetic and so on. The variable steam control allows you to set the steam output on the required level for an effective iron. The vertical shot of steam feature gives adaptability in sprucing up hanging articles of clothing, upholstery, and drapery while saving an ample amount of time required for setting up the ironing board. You can always opt for dry ironing by making the selection depending upon the fabric type.
Portable Mini Steam Iron 3 in 1 Travel Paring Knife Black Picture Frame Set Picture Frame Set of 2 Mini Steamer Travel Iron Color White Green Black Black Black

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All I can say is….Wow!
reviews.reviewText: This little guy packs a big punch! Particularly for the price! I have made 3 attempts with Amazon to find a travel iron that works equally as well as a steamer. My go to for testing is my linen shirts. The iron heats up very quickly and does an impressive job of minimizing the wrinkles. Love that it is 1000 watts of power! Then I gave it the true test..steam. Very effective! For such a little guy..I was impressed. It doesn’t have a zillion steam vents and doesn’t need them.Definitely travel size. It’s compact and comes with a drawstring bag which is a nice touch. Not crazy about the resting plate being plastic…..and it IS noisy, but not a deal breaker.Only had it a day but this baby won’t be going back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing works!
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer! It’s not big and bulky, so it’s easy to store. It heats up super fast and puts out a lot of steam! Worked great on multiple fabrics at my neice’s wedding. One fill lasted longer than I expected and when I refilled it hot, the steam was immediate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This does work, but don’t expect it to be a professional steamer.
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my shirts that are wrinkled as an iron/steamer. This does work to iron shirts, but again, it doesn’t replace the old fashioned Iron. The steam works great when the water tank is full. It did not leak out of the holes when I was using it as an iron. I recommend this for simple and quick steaming and ironing jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT MINI IRON!
reviews.reviewText: Due to my hands not at 100%: I appreciate anything easy to hold, lightweight, and easy to maneuver. This little thing covers me on all three. I also appreciate the three temps available. Because it's so easy to use- I have found myself using it more like an iron than a steamer- but both work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 4 months
reviews.reviewText: Worked fine in the beginning, steam function was a little leaky and would get my clothes wet. Now it doesn’t even heat the plate/dry iron function after only 4 months. Would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE! Way better than my old one. Works great as steam and iron
reviews.reviewText: This is great! I ironed with it at home just to test it, and it did a really good job for such a lightweight iron. The steam is impressive, and the tank is a decent size. This is a fantastic travel iron and steamer. We are taking a trip soon, and this is already in my stack for packing. My other one is going in the donation pile. This iron took wrinkles out of a cotton hang-dry top, and as a steamer, it took wrinkles out of a polyester/rayon-type skirt. My only reason for deducting a star is that you can't rest it anywhere to rotate your clothing on the ironing board. You can only put it plate-side down or on its side. It really needs a design where it can stand on its own or some way to rotate the handle like a kickstand or something. You almost need one extra hand to be able to turn your clothes and hold the iron at the same time. I just put it down for a couple seconds, turned the clothes a little, picked up, turned, etc., until I finally got them into the next ironing position. Not convenient. This is only a problem for ironing, not steaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little guy really packs a punch!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this for my guest bedroom, but have used it when I had to travel for a wedding. This thing is not kidding! It really puts out some steam. My sister's OCD bf tried it and said, "send that to your sister! We need that!" Having to use the stand is a bit annoying, but the product is worth it. It does it's job well both as an iron and steam iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Have!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say how much I love this product. I literally iron on my washer with this little beauty! The steam this little iron puts out is nothing short of amazing. This iron is light, small and mighty! Never to be wrinkled again, well you know what Im saying :)Highly Recommend! *****
